mainSequence.step: UI Dashboard requests most frequently ordered food of the month from Backend Server
Backend Server queries ordered food data of the month from Database
Backend Server processes data to find most frequently ordered dishes
Backend Server sends report of most frequently ordered food to UI Dashboard
UI Dashboard displays most frequently ordered food report to Manager

asteps.step: Database returns ordered food data of the month
Backend Server processes data to find most frequently ordered dishes
Backend Server sends report of most frequently ordered food to UI Dashboard
UI Dashboard displays most frequently ordered food report to Manager
Backend Server sends no data message to UI Dashboard
UI Dashboard displays no data available message to Manager
